title: What's News: World-Wide
text:
Russia unleashed a barrage of missiles across Ukraine with strikes on critical infrastructure, cutting off power and water supplies in the capital and several other cities, Ukrainian authorities said.

Iran's military crackdown on protesters in the country's Kurdish region is becoming increasingly deadly. Human-rights groups say over 300 people have been killed since the protest movement began in September.

A Walmart overnight manager allegedly opened fire at the Chesapeake, Va., store where he worked, killing six people and leaving six others injured. He then fatally shot himself police said.

What's News: World-Wide
